channel.title: youtube – The Chat Codes Blog
channel.description: For all that is chat related.

item.title: Stickers!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: 17’th of May, Facebook released their Version 6 of the Facebook app for iphone and android. However, they did not release any methods for computer users running facebook in google chrome, firefox, opera, safari, Internet Explorer or any other browser! … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
17’th of May, Facebook released their Version 6 of the Facebook app for iphone and android.

However, they did not release any methods for computer users running facebook in google chrome, firefox, opera, safari, Internet Explorer or any other browser!

So, http://chatstickers.com/Â was madeÂ by one of our developers, and a extension was created byÂ Velja JankoviÄ‡.

Here’s how it works:

item.title: New Extension!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Mohamed Mahmoud releasedÂ Facebook chat emoticons with new and big pictures v3 today! Get it here: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/140346 For Google chrome users, download and open this file first: http://www.mediafire.com/?b6eutyx5ul85lql OrÂ see how to install it from here : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WG_kM8BEIQE For Firefox users,Â first install … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Mohamed Mahmoud releasedÂ Facebook chat emoticons with new and big pictures v3 today!

Get it here:
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/140346

For Google chrome users, download and open this file first:

http://www.mediafire.com/?b6eutyx5ul85lql

OrÂ see how to install it from here :
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WG_kM8BEIQE

For Firefox users,Â first install this add on:

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/

Or see how to install it from here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ARdDp0jH0wY
For animated pictures: see this note:
http://www.facebook.com/mohamed408/notes

item.title: Extension Update! (again)
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Mohamed Mahmoud updated his extension, again! Get it here while it’s hot! ðŸ˜€ http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/140346 And if you need help to install the extension, check out this guide he made for firefox and google chrome! ðŸ˜‰
item.content:encoded:
Mohamed Mahmoud updated his extension, again!

Get it here while it’s hot!

http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/140346

And if you need help to install the extension, check out this guide he made for firefox and google chrome!

item.title: Chat with anyone on Facebook!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: LÃ© Boss found a neat trick that allows you to chat with anyone on facebook, even Mark Zuckerberg! All you need, is this code: javascript:;Chat.openTab(“4”, “zuck”, “friend”) Check out this youtube-video to see how it works… ðŸ˜‰
item.content:encoded:
LÃ© Boss found a neat trick that allows you to chat with anyone on facebook, even Mark Zuckerberg!

All you need, is this code:

javascript:;Chat.openTab(“4”, “zuck”, “friend”)

Check out this youtube-video to see how it works…

item.title: Le Boss needs your photoshop skills!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Le Boss, the original creator of the chatcodes extensions for firefox/google chrome needs someone with photoshop skills for a project! If you have some spare time and experience with photoshop, please contact him at theztech@connect.to There will be compensation for … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Le Boss, the original creator of the chatcodes extensions for firefox/google chrome needs someone with photoshop skills for a project!

If you have some spare time and experience with photoshop, please contact him at theztech@connect.to

There will be compensation for your work.

item.title: Animated pictures in the Facebook Chat!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Today Taher Sellami showed me a new trick that allows us to post animated pictures in tha facebook chat! Check it out in the youtube-video below: Here are some animated pictures found by Revo Ramos: Animated pictures/codes: kitty wearing headphones: … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Today Taher Sellami showed me a new trick that allows us to post animated pictures in tha facebook chat!

Check it out in the youtube-video below:

Here are some animated pictures found by Revo Ramos:

Animated pictures/codes:

kitty wearing headphones: [[126138614064758]]
Full picture: http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=126138614064758&set=a.125244550820831.21461.123901794288440&type=1

item.title: iPhone/iPad/iPod App!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Josh Bitossi, a young developer from Austraila has made the first ever chat-codes related app for iPhone/iPad/iPod! Get it here: http://itunes.apple.com/au/app/facebook-emoticons/id496836592?mt=8 Josh Bitossi’s webpage: http://www.facebooksmileyshq.com/view-all-smileys/ You can see how it works in this video update:
item.content:encoded:
Josh Bitossi, a young developer from Austraila has made the first ever chat-codes related app for iPhone/iPad/iPod!

Get it here:
http://itunes.apple.com/au/app/facebook-emoticons/id496836592?mt=8

Josh Bitossi’s webpage:
http://www.facebooksmileyshq.com/view-all-smileys/

You can see how it works in this video update:
